about_the_game:
About Cargo Chaos

A pirate has hijacked a cargo ship and wants to kill the crew with his bat for reasons unbeknownst to us.
The crew will have to escape the ship via an evacuation helicopter.
But all the communication equipment has to be set up first before they can call the rescue.
The crew will have to work together to set up all the equipment, but they can't trust each other blindly, for there is a mole who can communicate to the pirate via a walkie-talkie.

Player types

  • Crewmate: Has to set up the equipment with their fellow crewmates and escape the ship. Crewmates can also pick up the captain's hat in case they have died. This will promote the crewmate to captain!
  • Captain: Has the same objective as other crewmates, but they have a bat with which they can kill the mole and stun the pirate.
  • Pirate: Has to kill all the crewmates before they escape the ship!
  • Mole: Has to act as a normal crewmate while giving information to the pirate via a walkie-talkie. The mole is also able to place tripwires!

short_description: Cargo Chaos is a PVP social deception game where 1 pirate & a mole play against a team of crewmates. The crewmates have to repair all the communication equipment on board to call in the evacuation helicopter. They will have to work together to do the repairs, but don't trust everyone blindly...
